title: Anonymous Message Board
text: Post, report, or delete a thread or a reply. Uses Node/Express for server, Mongoose/mongoDB along with mLab for database hosting, Mocha/Chai for testing, Helmet for security, bcrypt for hashing passwords, and more.

title: Pomodoro Clock
text: A timer that has changeable session and break lengths. Uses React for rendering changes in time along with css for styling.

title: Stock Price Checker
text: Pull stock price data from IEX API. Uses Node/Express for server, Mongoose/mongoDB along with mLab for database hosting, Mocha/Chai for testing, and Helmet for security.

title: Choropleth Map
text: View data from a tooltip for each U.S. county. Uses Data Driven Documents (D3) to better visualize data, along with styling from CSS.

title: Issue Tracker
text: Convert metric to imperial or vice versa. Uses Node/Express for server, Mongoose/mongoDB along with mLab for database hosting, Mocha/Chai for testing, and Helmet for security.

title: Drum Machine
text: Post, report, or delete a thread or a reply. Uses React for rendering changes for clicks and audio. Also uses CSS for styling.
